subject: p10410641
Findings: Bilateral pigtail catheters are present at the lung bases. Moderate right apical pneumothorax has minimally decreased since yesterday. The maximum width at the apex measures 24 cm as compared to yesterday measuring 27 cm. Opacity at the right lung base which appeared on the yesterdays radiograph is more denser and is likely from an aspiration or atelectasis. Small right pleural effusion is unchanged.
Impression: Moderate right apical pneumothorax has very minimally decreased since yesterday. Right lower lung opacity concerning for aspiration/atelectasis is more denser than before, though not increased in size. Small right pleural effusion is unchanged. No new left pleural effusion.
